title: Are George Washington’s Hair and JFK’s Harvard Sweater Up for Auction?
subtitle: "The copious lock of George Washington's grayish tan hair is tied together with a fine white thread and displayed within a locket-style bezel," according to RR Auctions.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: A 2021 Presidents Day auction was selling, among other things, actual hair from former President George Washington and a Harvard sweater that belonged to John F. Kennedy.
